law.catch_line: Loading of carcasses with live animals prohibited.
law.text: An animal carcass shall not be loaded in cars, crates, boats, wagons or other vehicles containing live animals, except on special permit from the state veterinarian.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 15, effective June 25, 2009. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 63c-10.
